website_summaries.verdict: The DaVinci Emily changing table is similar to the Delta Eclipse, but carries a slightly less durable design.
pros: A basic, no-frills changing table that offers ample storage space for nursery items
It stands out for being easy to assemble
We love that it also comes with an anti-tip kit for added safety
cons: We found that this changing table is lightweight and seems less sturdy than other models we tested

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive changing table!
customer_reviews.text: Could not disagree more with some other reviews, this is VERY sturdy. One of the more attractive looking changing tables in my opinion and it feels solid when you move it. I personally love the style of this piece too, its curvy and soft shape makes it fit in beautifully in the nursery. The shelving is thin like someone mentioned, but there are support brackets and so far I have had no issues. I'm very pleased with this purchase and highly recommend. Sarah (baby due in 1 week!)
customer_reviews.author: Greg and Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fairly simple to put together, nice design
customer_reviews.text: Took me about 45 minutes to put this together with being cautious (first baby furniture item I put together). Very happy with the design. I questioned the durability of the shelf and table bottoms (the flat pieces) and posed a question to the group of people here on Amazon who bought it before and they assured me it is very durable. I put 4 stars still being cautious, but I will up it to 5 stars once it is baby tested! I bought a DaVinci crib too (Jame 4-in-1) and found that to be even easier to put together and very sturdy materials.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Murray

customer_reviews.title: The other thing I don’t like is that the girls push themselves and often hit ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to pay 2x the price for the drawers but I should have because when the twins got older they pulled everything out from the shelves and they always make a huge mess. The other thing I don’t like is that the girls push themselves and often hit their head on the bar. I try to remember to leave a towel there to pad it. Oh well... it does an ok job otherwise. I like that it’s easy to get rid of and does not take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Mahoney Kreidl

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great item - especially for something you won't use for very long. Super easy to assemble and more than adequate quality. The finish is durable and evenly applied and once assembled the unit feels very sturdy. I do recommend you pay close attention to the instructions and get the pieces identified and sorted before assembly because they may look the same but they are different.
customer_reviews.author: LeonaB

customer_reviews.title: I like this very much
customer_reviews.text: I like this very much. My wife suggested me to buy those with drawers. but after it's assembled and put into use for days, she said, this one is much convenient and comfortable to use. wonderful. The only thing I doubted a lot , is the packing. When I was assembling it, I found a lot of glass fibers on the parts, they might be harmful to babies' breathe. So I need to use a mop to clean it .
customer_reviews.author: Ping Qiu

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item 4 stars rather than 5 only because we had to mail back the first one because it was faulty. Even though Amazon makes returns and exchanges about as painless as possible, It's still a pain to have to rebox something that large and prep it for being mailed back. The problem with the first one is that some of the pre-drilled holes did not align properly, making it impossible to assemble. The second one came together fine. It's not the most solid piece of furniture we've owned, but for around $100, it defnitely does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Diffective item
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this changing table and expected it to be great. However the bar underneath the table where my baby lies keeps falling out... I keep having to screw it back in. Which is very frustrating and not SAFE for my baby... This means the table can collapse!!
customer_reviews.author: Dini p.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Looks good. Price is right. Sturdy during use (and I have a hefty little boy!)
customer_reviews.author: Alan&Katie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This changing table is great for the price -- it is sturdy and has lots of space for storage. The changing pad that it comes with isn't contoured, so we ordered a different one to help keep our baby from rolling off. All in all, very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: SO useful and SO attractive
customer_reviews.text: So attractive and useful. It matches the DaVinci crib and looks great. However, we put it in the family room since that is where we are most often.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: Changing table looks great, however the sturdiness of construction is not so ...
customer_reviews.text: Changing table looks great, however the sturdiness of construction is not so great. One of the pieces of wood cracked very easily. My husband had to reinforce everything and we are not sure we'll be able to use this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alla

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: Being quite flimsy means 4 stars. I will break it eventually, but it has perfectly held up through 5 months of use. This has been a great, attractive purchase for our nursery. For the price, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: zoso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our baby's room
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together. I did it myself in a short time while 9 months pregnant. It's very cute. I thought I'd miss not having a roll out drawer like I did with my daughter's changing table, but it's actually just fine without. Very happy with the quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: kvsgirl2004

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy.  Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: flimsy piece. wouldnt even put a newborn on top of this for fear it would collapse. shelves are only about 1/4 inch thick and not solid wood. returned immediately
customer_reviews.author: Illinois1

customer_reviews.title: Good changing table
customer_reviews.text: Good changing table. My only complaint is the surface of the table is not wood but compressed board. May not hold up well if it gets really wet.
customer_reviews.author: Nevan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent baby furniture
customer_reviews.text: Matches our cribs and streamlined designed just works! Make sure to get a better topper for the changing pad though.
customer_reviews.author: Askjok

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a modern, simple but stylish changing table to accompany the rest of the nursery furniture. I was also looking for a tall changing table because my husband and I are tall. This changing table met all my requirements. I use colorful baskets for storage which adds a pop of color to the nursery. The table is sturdy, but I did purchase a different changing pad. The changing pad that came with the table was a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Super pretty and easy to put together! I'm almost 9 months pregnant and I had it put together in 30 minutes all by myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom will love this
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble and very attractive. Looks real nice with baskets on the shelves. Order this with a changing pad and a pad cover.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice; very pretty.
customer_reviews.text: The changing table matches the baby’s bed we had gotten in the same product line. Very pretty design; solid wood construction. The hardware (threaded fittings pre-installed in parts) may not be of the highest quality; and so it was necessary to be patient when assembling. We had a couple of fittings that my husband had to re-thread before the bolts would go in properly. Otherwise, we’re very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Parce

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and practical nursery item.
customer_reviews.text: Great changing table with lots of space for storing thins underneath. Oak matches the furniture that was already in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianne Lipsky

customer_reviews.title: great changing table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice changing table. It was easy to assemble and is very sturdy and solid. Im very happy with the quality and im looking forward to using it once my baby arrives!
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Love this changing table
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing table!! I literally read millions of reviews about every table I liked and of course there are just as many good as bad. This met all my expectations. It is not flimsy like many reviews claim. Color is perfect and was in perfect condition when delivered. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: JAMIE davis

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, open shelves are practical
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, open shelves are practical. Definitely more sturdy when attached to the wall. Color is good and matches DaVinci expresso crib perfectly
customer_reviews.author: startb

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, very easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the changing table and found it very easy to assemble. We got some nice baskets to put on shelves to store stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and quick assembly
customer_reviews.text: This took about 15 minutes to put together with a power drill, and it matches my Ashbury crib very nicely. I'm pleased with the piece.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: The table was easy to assemble and is sturdy. We have it next to a white Da Vinci Kalani crib and it looks great. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the curb bad changing table for my daughter and new granddaughter. Both are excelled quality and can be used fir years to come. I chose his changing table vs be one with drawers because the crib transforms and is built to last from crib to college. This changing table has enough space for all your baby needs but can be a beautiful nightstand , small table in your child's room for years to come. The "Emily" set is a beautiful mission/sleigh design that will never look dated
customer_reviews.author: NCB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to assemble, wish it had more braces....
customer_reviews.author: Beverly M. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: New parents -to-be love it, Dad says easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: New parents -to-be love it, Dad says easy to put together. Waiting for a new someone to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and real sturdy for the fact that the legs and pegs are thin. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: kikibengo

customer_reviews.title: Looks good...frustrating screw holes.
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of it, but the holes did not grip the middle shelf well & the screw did not tighten all the way, leading to a split in the wood shelf during attempted tightening. For the price, a nice looking unit, just a bit disappointed to have to glue the shelf connection.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, easy to put together and a great price. The espresso finish ,at he's very nicely with our baby cache Montana crib in espresso.
customer_reviews.author: allyson

customer_reviews.title: Screws falling after less than two months of buying!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know what happened with this product! Screws fell after just 2 month of use of my 6 month old baby!! Very bad quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: slight "new furniture" smell (which is not harmful... davinci is eco-friendly furniture), sturdy, easy to put together. exactly what you need for a new baby. A++
customer_reviews.author: Angelo A.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Almost wish I bought a davinci crib to go w this. Quality is superb. Assembly was a snap. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great quality changing table for a nice price. and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great item seller shipped incorrect item the first time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item seller shipped incorrect item the first time and had to wait a while to receive the correct order but the item itself is GREAT! Sturdy, easy to build and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Kory Koger

customer_reviews.title: Good table, cushion not so much
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is one of those flat ones that I didn't like. We ended up ordering the Davinci curved cushion made for dresser tops. It fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kory

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the matching crib and dresser from another website but found the changing table on amazon for a better price. The quality of the wood is excellent and the color is an amazing dark brown color. It is very sturdy and was very easy to put together. Plenty of room on the two shelves for diapers, wipe warmer, lotions, and much more.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Brighina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. One more rail along the top would be an improvement to the design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had it since my kid was born. Still using it for putting her clothes and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Sumera

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Matches our crib perfectly. Very nice product and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Minimal, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is a very simple changing table. It did not take too long to put together at all. The pad that comes with it is quite thin, though, and we bought a different one instead. It doesn't have all the bells and whistles, but there is plenty of room for storage baskets on the shelves so everything will be close at hand. We got the same style crib and it matches perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Good option
customer_reviews.text: I read a ton of reviews before deciding to purchase this. I put it together myself at 9 months pregnant with no problem. The instructions were pretty easy to follow. If you've ever put a piece of Ikea furniture together this is no different. It feels sturdy and I actually really like the change pad it comes with. It fits in perfect and the rails on the side and the actual safety belt work great. I will say the wood is quite soft so it will probably scratch over time but for the price I can't complain. It's a great deal and looks great with the Emily mini crib!
customer_reviews.author: JennM

customer_reviews.title: attractive, sturdy, functional piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Easy to assemble. Lots of storage space.Roomy changing area. Quality of this changing table was above my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Belongie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our daughter to match an oak crib. The color is true and matches nicely. Our son in law put it together himself when the baby arrived early. I would say this became one of the most important pieces of furniture for the new parents and baby. Our daughter had complications and surgery after the birth. She said the level of the changing table is perfect and saving her much possible discomfort. It is very well constructed with plenty of room for storing baby bath and diaper supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: very attractive & practical
customer_reviews.text: This goes into my new grandson's room. It matches the bureau, night stand and bed (Dream On Me Ashton 4 in 1 Convertible Crib, Espresso) very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: T. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Breaks Easily
customer_reviews.text: We bought this changing table a few months before the baby was born and my husband was able to easily put it together. A month after she was born, we noticed that the bottom of the right side had broken. Luckily the baby was not on it when we noticed this. We contacted DaVinci and they replaced the piece. A few months later, we were moving the table and the piece broke again. We have also had problems with the Emily dresser as well. We have the Emily crib and love it but will never buy anything else from DaVinci again.
customer_reviews.author: Cyriac

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected but finish is soft. Slid it to move it on hardwood floor and it left white mark. Very happy otherwise. Very nice design.
customer_reviews.author: Krismarischo

customer_reviews.title: over all style
customer_reviews.text: Was very satisfied with the design and the color and for the area it was going into it was a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Changing table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match the baby bed for my son's newborn. They plan on putting baskets on the shelves to add color to the room and for storage.
customer_reviews.author: L. Christensen

product_meta.title: DaVinci Emily Changing Table II, Oak
product_meta.description: The newly redesigned Emily Changing Table complements the equally elegant Emily 4-in-1 Convertible Crib, exuding the same lasting charm and convenient functionality. Featuring an open shelf design, parents can keep baby's necessities visible and accessible. The top changing station is also thoughtfully constructed with an extra rail for added safety and support to change baby with ease. Beyond the diaper years, the included changer pad can easily be removed and the Emily Changing Table becomes a versatile piece that effortlessly meets your family's changing storage needs.
feature_bullets: Finished in non-toxic multi-step painting process, lead and phthalate safe
This item is eligible for free replacement parts. Contact Amazon Customer Service for more information.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars76 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
